name: Ryan Hominda
text: Unbelievable salads! Was not expecting that. I actually liked the cauliflower crust too!

name: Dale Bloaterman
text: Thanks MOD Pizza for the six, count them SIX pepperonis on my pizza. I guess 2020 has been hard on the pepperoni farmers and you gotta do what you gotta do to make ends meet. Also, two whole pieces of ham. Two whole pieces, oh my lord!

name: Stevey B
text: Awesome food and great prices. Staff was friendly and professional! Nice and clean in here as well.

name: Jody Doty
text: I love MOD pizza but they have left off one of the toppings of my pizza twice. I called after the second time and never received a call back. The pizzas are great but need more care to pay attention to details of on line orders. It's not ‚Ä¶More

name: Rupert Wolfe Murray
text: Great pizza and friendly service.

name: Lisa Talbott
text: The pizza was perfect.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  Highly recommend it!

name: Jean-Claude Jr. Lefebvre
text: It's good, manager was working in the dining area occupying one of the few open table for customer...

name: K R
text: We went last night for the first time. I've been to other Mod Pizza stores on the east coast, where the service was fast. However, the service was pretty slow and there was a long line at this store. The pizza was good but when I asked for ‚Ä¶More

name: Bill Brewster
text: The Harbor Hill Mod is such a great addition to the neighborhood!  Fun, hard-working people.  Every pizza made to order is most excellently prepared by friendly folks.  I am earning lots of Rewards.  I may need to limit how much I go?  üòÜ

name: Elizabeth Andrew
text: With limited capacity and covid precautions, they were still awesome. Staff was wonderful.

name: Mallory Lindstrom
text: I‚Äôm super impressed by this place! I have been 3 times since it‚Äôs opened and have received good service and food each time. It has been super busy each time I‚Äôve been and the staff handles it well. The line has been long but it moves ‚Ä¶More

name: JoeDon Kaser
text: Best pizza I've ever had at a restaurant

name: J Parker
text: Normally I say Mod is great, but this is the second time in a row they've left a topping off of my wife's pizza.

name: K Coberly
text: Excellent food and customer service! The place was also super clean! We‚Äôll definitely be back!

name: Rob Hodson
text: Good pizza and perfect size.

name: Todd Brusa
text:
Good pizza for fast casual dining.  PROS:  allow you as many toppings as you want.
CONS: very skimpy on the amount of toppings and a overpriced.  One pizza will not fill you up!!

name: diane lindall
text: I am not a huge pizza fan but I really like MOD pizza. They dont drown a thick chewy crust with sauce. I love the thin crispy crust and the fact that you can get whatever you want on it.  Try hamburger, canadian bacon, mozzarella, pineapple and gobs of red onion!  Oh yes, and have them put garlic on the crust!  Yum

name: Kera Hallman
text: Sent the kids to go pick up pizza for a group of us. We have had Mod Pizza in Oregon and love it. This location has just opened up and it's clear they are struggling to keep up with the demand. The toppings were severely lacking, my guess ‚Ä¶More

name: Sanjay PerryCook
text: Really good food.

name: Chris Lawrence
text: The worse customer service/ the staff socializing about a phone call making fun of a caller for 20 minutes/ unprofessional/ pizza ended up burnt and disgusting/ horrible experience.

name: MARCUS BOYNTON
text: This place is great. They fixed my washing machine in 2 days. Absoluty Magnificent

name: Rob
text: Great pizza per usual franchise model. However - they have opened way too soon as they are unable to handle online orders or the speed aspect required within the industry. ‚Ä¶More

name: PapaJoe FPS
text: Great tasting pizza made to order. Wonderful staff that treat you well. A great atmosphere!!! Feel the MODNESS!!!

name: James Costello
text: Love what this place stands for, and the food is always good.

name: Kristen Hanson
text: The food was delicious, the service was very friendly and helpful. We are very glad to have a Mod Pizza in Gig Harbor!

name: David Nguyen
text: Always love this place.  If you dont know mod it's like chipotle for pizza, build your own style.

name: Pleadco Jones
text: Good pizza and a great cauliflower crust. It wasn't expensive to feed 6 people compared to any other pizza place.

name: Joseph Easley
text: Great customer service.

name: Jacob Schwarting
text: Newest pizza joint here in the great Gig in the Sky...Mod Pizza! Good business model adopted from places such as Subway, Chipotle, etc., but with pizza as the medium. A true "create your own"style walk-thru style make table where you ‚Ä¶More

name: Ross Fulton
text: Friendly service, and very fast

name: Charles Nunn
text: They make a great pizza exactly how you want it in about the time it takes to get a subway!

name: todd coleman
text: Amazing pizza and great service

name: Ronja Johnson
text: The staff looked like they were having an existential crisis if you say the word pizza. Hire people that actually know what they're doing instead of making a fashion statement with belly shirts.

name: Luis
text: Like the pizza, just wasn't pleased when the person preparing my food decided to stop and help someone else who came in after me (was obviously a friend). My pizza sat there about 5 - 8 minutes, which may not seem like a long time but under the above circumstances, is not acceptable.

name: J. Leon
text: Great customer service

name: Ian Carlson
text: A very interesting concept to Pizza. Cauliflower crust is very good.

name: Di Langhelm-Stout
text: Good, but nothing too special. Gets loud like a cafateria.

name: Tim Duclos
text: Build your own pizza is one price regardless of how much you add to your pizza

name: Charity
text: Amazing food, great staff, welcoming, clean and very reasonably priced.

name: Jen Rigs
text: I‚Äôve been to several MOD pizza locations, even in other states. I agree with other reviews- they skimp on toppings here. Also, the chick with purple hair is quite rude. Both times we‚Äôve come here, she‚Äôs gotten rude with us bc she didn‚Äôt understand the order. I‚Äôd rather wait for MOD pizza the next time I drive to Tacoma.

name: Kristi Orwoll
text: Ok, just too little crust

name: Jerame Cummings
text: Who doesn't love a make your own pizza for one low price.  And the salads are awesome.

name: Howard Struve
text: Love this place.

name: Rosa Velder
text: What a waste of money! Ordered the mega dough dillon james and it was not baked all the way through! There was so little sauce in it that it was a dried smear. Never again!

name: Mike C
text: Really good pizza and nice staff.
